title: Tested: Twelve South’s refreshed Backpack shelf perfectly complements Apple’s M1 iMac
content:
Twelve South has a habit of improving the experience offered by Apple’s own devices with its series of popular accessories. The latest of these just launched as the new Backpack for iMac, this time updated to complement the M1 version of desktop Mac. Delivering an aluminum shelf to rest hubs and other gear on out of sight behind your machine, our latest Tested with 9to5Toys looks at just the add-on really is.

more…

The post Tested: Twelve South’s refreshed Backpack shelf perfectly complements Apple’s M1 iMac appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: Just refreshed for the M1 iMac, the new Twelve South Backpack arrives with an aluminum shelf design to streamline your setup.
